answerText: supernovae [do not accept "nova"][10] The Type 1a version of supernova can be used as this type of measuring device because it always has the same maximum absolute magnitude.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 7 | 17 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: One type of these events occurs in a binary system when a white dwarf picks up mass from its neighbor.  [10] Name these massive stellar explosions, which in some cases can leave behind a neutron star.
